definition: the road one must follow or take/the only way/same as 必由之路[bi4 you2 zhi1 lu4]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: You are going to fail; failure is the path to success.
sentences.chinese: 準備好失敗，因爲失敗是成功的必經之路。

sentences.english: That is the way all military units come to the firing range.
sentences.chinese: 這是所有戰鬥單位前往靶場的必經之路。

sentences.english: This is one way on how to kiss perfectly.
And that's a legitimate way ofchanging the world.
sentences.chinese: 而這就是改變世界的一條必經之路。

sentences.english: Dali is the necessary way from Kunming to the Northwest.
sentences.chinese: 大理是昆明通往滇西北的必經之路。

sentences.english: Well, isn’t that just the way science is?
sentences.chinese: 但這不正是科學的必經之路嗎？

sentences.english: Be strong, and small and medium-sized enterprise development electronic commerce is only road.
sentences.chinese: 成爲強者，中小企業開展電子商務是必經之路。

sentences.english: Beijing's progress in going global is happening step-by-step and globalization is the route Beijing must take.
sentences.chinese: 北京的國際化在一步步發生着，全球化是其必經之路。

sentences.english: IT WAS only a matter of time before China was heralded as Europe's escape route from its debt crisis.
sentences.chinese: 中國早晚都會成爲歐洲擺脫債務危機的必經之路。

sentences.english: Abstract:Newtown construction is a key way for the urbanized advancement in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 新城建設是上海城市發展的必經之路。

sentences.english: The waters of eastern Bohai Straits is the only route for vessels entering or leaving Bohai Sea Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 渤海海峽以東海域是船舶進出渤海灣的必經之路。

sentences.english: 'Painful as it may be, it is the road we must take,' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，儘管可能感到痛苦，但這是我們的必經之路。

sentences.english: All the way to go ah, are the only way.
sentences.chinese: 凡是要走的路啊，都是必經之路。

sentences.english: To be a manager , you have to start at the bottom - no exceptions.
sentences.chinese: 從低做起，是每一位領袖必經之路。

sentences.english: Newtown construction is a key way for the urbanized advancement in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 新城建設是上海城市發展的必經之路。

sentences.english: Shuffle off normal practices and say goodbye to stereotypes, which is the only way to art learning.
sentences.chinese: 走出成法，告別陳規，這是學習藝術的必經之路。

definition: the road back to where one came from
to make a detour/to take the long route
simple home-style meal/common occurrence/nothing out of the ordinary
to get out of the way/to step aside
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
to run around all over the place
lit. to see a gap and stick in a needle (idiom); fig. to make use of every second and every inch
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
